en.purpose: Sample fhir-based cds-rules for demonstration purposes only.

es.purpose: Ejemplos de reglas de cds basadas en fhir para propósitos de demostración

when: (($gt0006|Ulceration of foot|!=null)||($gt0009|Spreading infection|!=null))||(($gt0012|Critical limb ischaemia|!=null)||(($gt0015|Gangrene|!=null)||($gt0018|Suspicion of an acute arthropathy|!=null)))

((((($gt0026|Previous ulceration therapy|!=null)||($gt0029|Amputation condition|!=null))||($gt0119|Amputation procedure|!=null))||($gt0032|Renal replacement therapy|!=null))||(($gt0035|Neuropathy|!=null)&&($gt0038|Non-critical limb ischaemia|!=null)))||((($gt0035|Neuropathy|!=null)&&($gt0041|Callus of limb|!=null))||((($gt0035|Neuropathy|!=null)&&($gt0044|Deformity of limb|!=null))||((($gt0038|Non-critical limb ischaemia|!=null)&&($gt0041|Callus of limb|!=null))||(($gt0038|Non-critical limb ischaemia|!=null)&&($gt0044|Deformity of limb|!=null)))))

gt0072.text: Immediate referral to general surgery. Also notify multidisciplinary foot care team.
